website_summaries.verdict: One of the most trusted, reliable brands on the market for gently and efficiently removing makeup.
pros: Oil-based formula glides across your lips and eyelids making eye shadow, mascara, and lipstick easy to remove
cons: Some users find this formula a tad too oily

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I’m what you would call makeup ignorant. I wear the matte lip from Maybelline and would struggle getting it off. I saw that they recommend using this to take it off and it’s completely gone in a few sweeps with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyCash

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you wear a lip stain
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to lip stains, and had no idea how to remove the stain at the end of the day. I somehow stumbled across this, and I am SO glad I did! It does a great job of removing the stain and moisturizing my lips. I actually was testing stains out on my hand, and even after many hand washes and a shower, the stains were still there. I used this - and they wiped right off. This will become a staple for me!
customer_reviews.author: •sky•

customer_reviews.title: excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I never tried a lip color remover before, thought I'd give it a try. This works GREAT! Works easily without any greasy yuck, and you don't have to rub... color really just slides off. Super happy with this remover and I definitely will buy it again once I run out of it.
customer_reviews.author: pursuetruth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product now for a few months and it doesn't work as advertised. I apply, rub lips together and let sit for a few minutes. I have to tug and pull a tissue over my lips and still a residue of color remains. Nothing like the old Superaway product that came in a soft tube. This isn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ladylou312

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't remove it instantly - like apply it then wipe the lipstick off
customer_reviews.text: Well honestly I bought this as an experiment to see if it would remove Lip Sense lipstick. It actually did. It doesn't remove it instantly - like apply it then wipe the lipstick off.. it took quite a few applications, and some scrubbing. But I still will keep as an alternative removal method if I don't feel like using soap.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Mcbunny

customer_reviews.title: ... try this after buying some liquid lipstick that worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I had to try this after buying some liquid lipstick that worked better than expected. The lipstick wouldn't come off no matter what I tried, but a little bit of this stuff and it came right off. Makes me wonder what the heck's in makeup these days, but I'm glad it works!
customer_reviews.author: Shia Teague

customer_reviews.title: It's a product eraser - it does exactly what you ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a product eraser - it does exactly what you think it would. It works and helps with the soreness from rubbing on my lips to get it off normally.
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: Works well, leave it on for several minutes though
customer_reviews.text: And you may neee to coat in 2 or 3 times to get it all off. But I have super sensitive skin prone to dryness and this remover (and the lipstain it's meant to dissolve) are buttery and rich and haven't caused me any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kira-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me with waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the same order as a Neutrogena eye make up remover. I decided to use each one at the same time, for the first time.( I was worried the covergirl wouldn't work, So I bought the Neutrogena one as a second) My right eye, covergirl, left eye, Neutrogena. I clearly saw a difference. The mascara all came off my lashes with one slow, steady wipe. The Neutrogena had mascara left, not a lot, in the outer-corner group of lashes...swiped slow and steady. I have blonde eyelashes (red hair) and wear a ton of eye makeup. So, I know the covergirl works awesome. As long as I can find it, its my new #1.
customer_reviews.author: jessabelle1

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I know about this before?
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I never knew a product like this existed. I’ve been wearing extended wear and “stay put” lipstick for many many years and it was always a pain to remove. This eraser is amazing and does exactly what it is supposed to do - removes even the most stubborn stay on lipstick. Works easily and thoroughly and you don’t need to use much of it at all for it to work. Plus it’s easy to apply and since it’s the same size as a lipstick, it’s totally portable. I am now a devoted fan. I feel like I should buy several more right away in case it becomes discontinued for some reason!
customer_reviews.author: 9sapphires

customer_reviews.title: Is it needed?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this. I just don’t see that is needed. Any oils remove the color. So eating a salad or wiping with Vaseline with do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go along with the superstay liquid lipstick I got. I was told by a friend that the lipstick was hard to come off and stained their lips a little, but with this it was so easy to remove the lipstick and had no stain on my lips. Highly recommend for waterproof, smudge proof lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Allysha M Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, removes long lasting lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to these Maybelline super stay matte lipsticks precisely because you CAN'T remove them with anything....except for makeup remover liquids that are usually on big bottles and hard to harry around, so I go this eraser to see if it would help, and it did!! Discrete, easy to carry around and IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: MRC

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but this worked really well. I'd imagine the effectiveness of removal depends on the chemical composition of the product its removing, so some might not come off as well or at all. However in my case it worked great with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Clean up
customer_reviews.text: I like this goes on lighty and does not smear the lipstick I am trying to remove
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use lipstick that is suppose to stay put and it does. This stuff you put it on and whip it back off. works great
customer_reviews.author: piewacki

customer_reviews.title: significantly helpful
customer_reviews.text: trying to remove mattes with just water and soap was notably difficult tedious drying/damaging to skin and time consuming.. still need soap and water after to clean up the smears but its less notable now with this its easier and less to clean up/remove
customer_reviews.author: KAP

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It does not seem to erase as easy as said
customer_reviews.author: Ramby

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: This is very waxy like an old type chap stick and takes a lot of applications to remove black lip color.. might work for lighter colors. I’ll just stick to make up wipes
customer_reviews.author: MerriM

customer_reviews.title: Old shade gone instantly
customer_reviews.text: Works to instantly remove a y kind of lipstick you're wearing. Wipe once maybe twice and it's all gone. There's no residue so you can immediately apply a new shade of lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: dskarson

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Forget using lip scrubs, wipes and oils to remove your lipstick . This works perfectly and removes all traces of the long wearing lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaican

customer_reviews.title: Easy removal!
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t think that you should purchase the lipsticks without purchasing this. The lip color comes right off with this remover. I don’t know how I would remove my lip color without this remover.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Smells like nail polish remover + tastes like Kerosene :(
customer_reviews.text: Smells like nail polish remover, tastes like kerosene, and really didn't work very well without some SERIOUS scrubbing. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ise Loa

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Was not fond of this remover and don’t use it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Susan  Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Could probably stick with vaseline or cocoa butter, but it's nice to have a go to I know will work.
customer_reviews.author: Zee S.

customer_reviews.title: It works! Finally lip color remover that removes stubborn color!
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline New York SuperStay Eraser Lip Color Remover, it works on all hard to remove lip color. It leaves your lips soft and supple!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Boglin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Breaks down the lipstick immediately. You can use chapstick but it’s not as fast.
customer_reviews.author: nola moore loskamp

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This works great for helping to remove long wear lipstick!! It doesn't require a lot so it will last me at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed to remove these SuperStay Matte Ink lipsticks
customer_reviews.text: Given the fact the SuperStay Matte Ink lipsticks are so strong, I was expecting this remover to be better than it is, it takes a couple of applications to fully remove the lipstick, especially reds or purple. Not sure if I’ll continue to use with this lipsticks, maybe it works better with the regular ones.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking of buying this and doubting if its worthy......IT IS ABSOLUTELY WORTH IT! I was shocked at how well it worked OMG dont think twice BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: olga quiroa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described! Let it sit on your lips for a couple seconds then wipe off. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Does the work!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, this is something that I needed for those lipstick that are hard to get off. Though it came without a package so it kind of give me second thoughts to use it at first
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Easy super stay lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Remove super stay lipstick (from Maybelline) as a breeze. Good product for its cause.
customer_reviews.author: Lenin G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The lip stain is amazing and this is the only thing that takes it clean off. Micellular water works ok but this eraser is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Airdose

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a liquid remover. It also worked well but this product is more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product, works exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Better than expected. Works amazingly well to remove the superstay lip stains. Would, will, absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Much needed with the Maybeline Superstay lipsticks!
customer_reviews.text: This is a much needed product with Maybeline super stay lipsticks. I got the maybeline super stay lipsticks and loved them. But there is no way you can get it off, it was still on my lips in 24 hours. This is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Swati

customer_reviews.title: Not a must have
customer_reviews.text: I had to reapply twice to remove my liquid lipstick. Would rather use baby oil and a cotton ball to get it off in one swipe. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: what i needed
customer_reviews.text: i just put on like regular lipstick and wipe my lips and the 24 hour lipstick is gone completely
customer_reviews.author: paula martinez

customer_reviews.title: Clean lips guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. removes all traces of all day lipsticks! Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best in removing longwear lip color!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to remove any long wear lipstick and it works amazing!! I put it on and a minute later I wipe off my lip color with ease. Love this stuff, I am a long time customer!
customer_reviews.author: RydiaRelm

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline had to make this! Their superstay colors do not budge without this eraser! The formula is very effective and ease of use is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Venkatesh

customer_reviews.title: Get you one !
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product ! It really works !
customer_reviews.author: BlondeGranny

customer_reviews.title: Great for the maybelliene lipsticks but super small lol
customer_reviews.text: Wish they sold this in bigger sizes lol, amazing must have product for the maybelliene super-stay liquid lipsticks, I do drag so I dramatically over-line and this makes it much easier to get off lol
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: im so glad i bought it
customer_reviews.text: if you by the lipstick, this is a must! im so glad i bought it! i dont know how i would have gotten the lipstick off otherwise. (i also love the lipstick! it really stays on!)
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for taking off any lipstick without scraping a layer of skin off! I have used it everyday since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Easy removal
customer_reviews.text: I use it to take off Colorstay lipstick, works beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: Cannot remove my oilproof long last lipstick easily, need to apply several times.
customer_reviews.author: HANNAH

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, amazingly so. No more struggle to remove my 24hr lipstick haha
customer_reviews.author: CrazyVix

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing with the Maybelline super stay lipstick. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Yair Jablinowitz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Long Wear @
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a oil based lipstick remover. It is the best remover I have found, not just for Maybelline, but pretty much every long lasting brand (J*, Revlon, Ofra, Anastasia BH are some that I have used this with).
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: You would be better off using revlon liquid make-up remover
customer_reviews.text: You would be better off using revlon liquid make-up remover. This does not evenly nor quickly remove it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jwoodall

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like a charm and is so smooth on your lips! Lipstick wipes right off with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: kjsddasa

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I use this to remove my 24 lasting lipstick and it works in seconds
customer_reviews.author: MiMiBee

customer_reviews.title: Good Removal
customer_reviews.text: This eraser lip color works. It will remove the 24 hr lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend for Kyle Cosmetics Matte Formula
customer_reviews.text: Hardly got any of my Kylie lip kit off my lips. I am sure it works great for other products, just not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a good remover
customer_reviews.text: It works a little but leaves quite a bit behind
customer_reviews.author: Desert Snow

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It works but I still prefer Maybellines "Superaway" long lasting lipstick remover.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydee

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do, easy to use, no mess, a real pleasure to have and use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wolfson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: it works as expected. The formulation could be better to remove the lipstick easier.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for removing long lasting lip color. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tam-TamTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: I found this pretty disappointing. The color didn't go on evenly and ...
customer_reviews.text: After using LipSense, I found this pretty disappointing. The color didn't go on evenly and didn't last through meals.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Simons-Lane

customer_reviews.title: It works!! 😄
customer_reviews.text: Thank u so much received it today very pleased 😃
customer_reviews.author: Moe joe

customer_reviews.title: Mabelline erase for 24 hour lipstay lipstick
customer_reviews.text: It removes this wonderful lipstick fast and leaves your lips smooth😉
customer_reviews.author: Sue L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I got this, makes it so much easier to take off long lasting lip stains!!
customer_reviews.author: ctk

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Tried to remove my lipstick but didn't work at all
customer_reviews.author: Mary Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. A make-up wipe is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It takes it all off quickly and leaves your lips feeling soft!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M. Sklaney

customer_reviews.title: Remover removes the impossible matte ink
customer_reviews.text: The maybelline super stay matte ink stays, best all day lipstick ever. Couldn’t get it off at all. No oil, makeup remover, soap, nothing. The superstay remover did it. Removed it perfectly. Great combo.
customer_reviews.author: Coco_D

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: helps remove the all day stay matte lip color. easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stashia Hajduk

customer_reviews.title: Whisks lipstick away
customer_reviews.text: This is great lipstick remover. The local store stopped carrying it, I was extremely happy to find it online
customer_reviews.author: Robin C

customer_reviews.title: It's needed
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing since the long lasting matte
customer_reviews.author: ashley e.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Must have for those long lasting lipsticks
customer_reviews.author: Tealzaire

customer_reviews.title: Takes Maybelline Super stay..Offffff..love it
customer_reviews.text: It works but takes a few applications to get the lipstick off..
customer_reviews.author: Ange4real

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a way to completely remove the lip color that I’m wearing when I want to put on another color. This absolutely does the trick! Thank you Maybelline!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Saylors

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have when wearing the super stay lip colors. It makes for much easier removal
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It actually works! I was hesitate but it really does work!
customer_reviews.author: Courtnie Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Removes long-wear lipstick in seconds without having to scrub your lips!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Superstay Lipstick comes off easily after one coat of this remover
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy, effective, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I had been looking for to get my all-day lip color off. Easy, effective, and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: Yakima Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Maybelline New York SuperStay Eraser Lip Color Remover, 0.1 oz.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY product that really works. The only one I will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: snicker1

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all!!!! I even tried to use it with the makeup remover wipe for my lip tint. It did not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the best products I have used for removing all-day lip color. Conveniently packaged in lipstick tube form.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Removes lip stain without scrubbing or drying out your lips!! Buying a second one to keep in my purse!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ugh
customer_reviews.text: It says I received it. But indeed do not have this. I have the other things that I bought with it.
customer_reviews.author: Seraphina Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent job
customer_reviews.text: It works wonderful if you buy you got to get the eraser
customer_reviews.author: Denise young

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Best thing I've found to remove the lip stain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to remove my matt lip color which i use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says for this lipstick which lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: James Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work>
customer_reviews.text: This did not remove my lipstick as claimed. It took several attempts and never removed all of the lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Joncee

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love the new Maybelline SuperStay lip colors, the first I've bought in years. They do have real staying power though, so I had trouble getting it off at the end of the day. Fortunately, the lip color remover works absolutely perfectly. Just apply generously, press lips together a few times, and wipe. Not only does it enable removal of the color in only one or two wipes, it feels nice going on, like good lip balm, and leaves my lips feeling moisturized after. Will be back for more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is my new go-to lipstick remover, it’s honestly ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to lipstick remover, it’s honestly the only one that actually works for long-lasting matte lipsticks. Just lather it on your upper and lower lips, grab a wet cloth or napkin, and then rub your lips gently back and forth until its all off. I highly recdomend this product if you use a lot of matte lippies!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I have makeup remover that didn't work. I even resorted to acetone once. Never EVER again because THIS is MAGIC!! Put it thinly on my bottom lip, on top of 16 hr SuperStay stain. I rubbed my lips together for about 5 seconds & it wiped CLEAN with toilet paper. Thank you, thank you! This was the only downside to using lip stain & you've fixed it for me! 😊 This is going to be a staple in my makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Use this to remove my long wearing matte lipsticks. ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this to remove my long wearing matte lipsticks. All it takes is a few swipes of this over the lipstick and even the most stubborn lipstick comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: CityGal410

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Maybelline New York Super Stay 24 lip color and, believe me, that color is on there to stay. I put it on in the morning and can eat and drink normally all day and still have color on my lips when I take my makeup off. This eraser works very well and takes the remainder of the color off easily. It feels creamy on my lips and leaves them feeling comfortable, not dried out. If you use one of the super stay on lip stains this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

customer_reviews.title: Superior item that I’m sorry I didn’t buy a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: Such a fabulous item! I bought it and never thought it would work. The lipstick I use, I practically have to scrub off with a Brillo pad. It is color stay something put out by Maybelline. A comment came up suggesting I buy this to remove it. This item does exactly what it says and at really great price! Will be purchasing more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Mctigue

customer_reviews.title: I found out later that regular Chapstick works just fine and it's much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my Maybelline lipstick said this was the product to use to remove the stain from my lips. I found out later that regular Chapstick works just fine and it's much cheaper. But this product does work, so I still gave it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it! Any oil like cooking oil will remove your stay on lipstick! Also, I did try it and it made my lips hurt for a whole day! It took three times for me to realize what had made my lips hurt. It was almost like an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Ise

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have 24hours / long stay lipstick, this is a must have. Before I had this I used oil based make up remover and it was quite hard to get it off, but for this, I rub on my lips like lipbalm, wait a few seconds and tissue off, it came right off!! AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Cha

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Stain Remover There Is!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing that can get off my lip stain. Far beats my expectations!!! Was blown away. And I’ve scrubbed my lips with many things to try to remove all my lip stains. Nothing worked.just remove what you can, then apply this/rub lips together & wipe off! That’s it! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: jessj1234

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York SuperStay Eraser Lip Color Remover, 0.1 oz.
product_meta.description: Gently remove your long-lasting lip color fast. This lipstick remover is as easy as 1,2,3. No scrubbing necessary, color comes off, instantly! • Long wear lip color removal stick • Gentle formula • No scrubbing required • Instantly remove long wear lip color Step 1. Apply stick to lips and rub lips together. Step 2. Wipe with a tissue.
feature_bullets: Long wear lip color removal stick
Instantly remove long wear lip color

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
